title: woedenaz: a tasteful collection
content: [[=]] [[module Rate]] [[/=]] [[module css]] .page_links { display: flex; height: 5.5rem; } .page_links div.WoedContainer { width: 100%; border-width: 1vh; margin: 1em; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 0; } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips { height: auto !important; flex-grow: 0; flex-basis: 1.5em; } .page_links div.WoedContainer.left-side, .page_links div.WoedContainer.right-side { flex-direction: column; margin-top: 1.5rem; } .page_links div.WoedContainer.left-side div.skips > div.labels, .page_links div.WoedContainer.right-side div.skips > div.labels { display: flex; margin: 0; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels { margin: 0.25rem 0.5vw 0.5rem 0.5vw; } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels, .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title::after, .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title::before { height: 1.5em; width: 100%; justify-content: center; } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title::after, .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title::before { pointer-events: none; } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title a:hover { text-decoration: none; } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title, .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title::after, .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title::before { transition-property: transform; transition-duration: 300ms; transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1); -webkit-transition-property: transform; -webkit-transition-duration: 300ms; -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1); } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title:hover { transform: translate(-0.15rem, 0.15rem); } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title:hover::after { transform: translate(0.15rem, -0.15rem); } .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels > .title:hover::before { transform: translate(0.15rem, -0.15rem); } @media only screen and (max-width: 980px) and (min-width: 480px) { .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels { font-size: 1.2rem !important; } } @media only screen and (max-width: 480px) { .page_links div.WoedContainer div.skips > div.labels { font-size: 1rem !important; } } [[/module]] [[div_ class="page_links"]] [[div_ class="WoedContainer left-side"]] [[div_ class="skips"]] [[div_ class="labels"]] [[div_ class="title" data-heading="Writing"]] [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/woedenaz/offset/0 Writing] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div_ class="WoedContainer right-side"]] [[div_ class="skips"]] [[div_ class="labels"]] [[div_ class="title" data-heading="Tech"]] [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/woedenaz/offset/1 Tech] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[module ListPages category="fragment" range="others" parent="." limit="1" order="created_at" offset="@URL|0" tags="-!pos!"]] %%content{1}%% [[/module]] [[div_ class="WoedContainer Writing"]] [[div_ class="skips"]] [[div_ class="labels"]] [[div_ class="title" data-heading="A Tasteful Collection"]] A Tasteful Collection [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div_ id="scps-block"]] [[module ListPages category="_default" name="SCP-2105" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" limit="1" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="SCP‑2105 || Programmable Occult" hide="SCP‑2105 || Programmable Occult"]] * Revenge? Self‑improvement? Worship? It's all a few key presses away... but is it worth the cost? * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * //"When Response Team M82 responded to the alarm, they found Dr. Forsyth and Dr. Marberry cleanly dismembered with no signs of struggle."// [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages category="_default" name="SCP-4378" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" range="others" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="SCP‑4378 || Her Noodly Appendage" hide="SCP‑4378 || Her Noodly Appendage"]] * //Cogito, ergo sum pasta.// Don't touch that lasagna. * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * //"A single piece of spaghetti found at the bottom of President █████ ███████'s bowl arranged in cursive writing spelling out "hello?""// [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages pagetype="normal" category="_default" name="SCP-4205" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" tags="-!pos!" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="SCP‑4205 || In⁠ ⁠The⁠ ⁠Eyes of⁠ ⁠the⁠ ⁠Beholder" hide="SCP‑4205 || In⁠ ⁠The⁠ ⁠Eyes of⁠ ⁠the⁠ ⁠Beholder⁠ ⁠⧲•⧲"]] * “If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets.” ― //Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore// * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * "Why did I never tell him? _ _ //Why did I never tell myself?//" [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages category="_default -fragment" name="compwan-source-manipulator" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="Tale || COMPWAN Source Manipulator" hide="Tale || COMPWAN Source Manipulator"]] * There's probably easier ways to get rid of someone you don't like... * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * **{{A program to compile the imperfect flesh.}}** [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages category="_default" name="scp-4512" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="SCP‑4512 || A Goddamn Filthy Teleporting Party Pool" hide="SCP‑4512 || A Goddamn Filthy Teleporting Party Pool"]] * This bad boy is a big, mean, luau party machine! * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * SCP-4512 is a 40 square meter sapient swimming pool capable of instantaneous translocation. [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages category="_default" name="the-moons-stellar-companion" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="Tale || The Moon's Stellar Companion" hide="Tale || The Moon's Stellar Companion"]] * Fun, exciting, magnificent Buddhist space adventure! * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * Gold columns rise above me endlessly, though I can see the very top as beings with hundreds of arms dance upon them to a silent rhythm. [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages category="_default" name="scp-4522" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="SCP‑4522 || The ⁠Mystical ⁠Village of ⁠the ⁠Jade ⁠Peach" hide="SCP‑4522 || The ⁠Mystical ⁠Village of ⁠the ⁠Jade ⁠Peach"]] * “Losing the possibility of something is the exact same thing as losing hope and without hope nothing can survive.” ― //Mark Z. Danielewski, House of Leaves// * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * Forgiveness is not something you beg or ask for, intruder. [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages category="_default" name="scp-4485" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="SCP‑4485 || Such Black Light" hide="SCP‑4485 || Such Black Light"]] * “As I sat on the chair I pondered sadly, but not desperately, Why the core of the world exuded such black light.” ― //Jean Hans Arp// * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * understanding is searching for an empty cup from which to drink air [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[module ListPages category="_default" name="scp-4801" order="updated_at desc" separate="no" range="others" class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="SCP‑4801 || Ceto‑vimutti: Deliverance From Suffering" hide="SCP‑4801 || Ceto‑vimutti: Deliverance From Suffering"]] * “This noble truth of suffering has been fully understood': thus, bhikkhus, in regard to things unheard before, there arose in me vision ... and light. ” ― //The Blessed One// * %%title_linked%% * %%created_at%% * (+%%rating%%) * Stripped bare, torn, sheared, and destroyed. And so now we can find a form far more refined. We have arrived. [[/collapsible]] [[/module]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="About Me" hide="Oh geez, why did you click this?"]] * Hello! It somewhat befuddles me that anyone would click this. But if you truly want to know more about me, this is the place! Too bad I am absolutely awful at writing about myself. But still, I'll give some things... _ _ I am a graphic designer for a living. I've made art and wrote for as long as I can remember. _ _ I'm also gay and a dude, if that's something you care about. Came out really late in life, so that factors in to my writing quite a bit. _ _ I really like writing stories that have mysteries to unpack. Like puzzles for the reader to find. I try to leave in little clues rather than just outright telling people. _ _ Okay, that's all you get. Thanks for stopping by! [[/collapsible]] [[div_ class="ko-fi"]] [[html]] [[/html]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div_ class="name"]] [[div_ data-heading="woedenaz" class="wrapper"]] woedenaz [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] ==== [[div_ class="WoedContainer Tech"]] [[div_ class="WholeContainer"]] [[div_ class="SkipsContainer"]] [[div_ class="skips"]] [[div_ class="labels"]] [[div_ class="title" data-heading="ACS Items"]] ACS Items [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div_ class="scps-block"]] [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fragment:woedenaz-tech/ACS-Image.png]] [[div_ class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="Anomaly Classification Guide" hide="Anomaly Classification Guide"]] [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/anomaly-classification-system-guide Click to Learn!] [[/collapsible]] [[/div]] [[div_ class="foldable-list-container"]] [[collapsible folded="yes" show="Classification Committee Memo" hide="Classification Committee Memo"]] [[div class="blockquote"]] Memo by [[*user djkaktus]] giving an in-universe explaination for ACS.
